mean_cn: vt. 松开，放松，放宽；  vi. 变松，松弛
mean_en: to make (something) less tight or firm; to make (something) loose or looser
word_etyma: loos(e)宽松的 + en动词后缀：使变成 → loosen使松弛
short_phrase: The boy loosens his ice skates.
sentence: I loosen my tie after a long day in the office.
sentence_trans: 在漫长的一天工作后，我松了松领带。
